description: Maps a user or group to the Amazon EMR Studio specified by StudioId, and applies a session policy to refine Studio permissions for that user or group. Use CreateStudioSessionMapping to assign users to a Studio when you use IAM Identity Center authentication. For instructions on how to assign users to a Studio when you use IAM authentication, see Assign a user or group to your EMR Studio.

parameters.name: StudioId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon EMR Studio to which the user or group will be mapped.

parameters.name: IdentityType
parameters.description: Specifies whether the identity to map to the Amazon EMR Studio is a user or a group.

parameters.name: SessionPolicyArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the session policy that will be applied to the user or group. You should specify the ARN for the session policy that you want to apply, not the ARN of your user role. For more information, see Create an Amazon EMR Studio User Role with Session Policies.
